member.summary: Describes the allowed Topology types for .

member.summary: The topology is unknown.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Client.WorkItemLinkType.Topology.Network
member.summary: Link types of this topology have no restrictions and are non-directional. Links can have circular relationships. The link looks the same from both the forward end and the reverse end.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Client.WorkItemLinkType.Topology.DirectedNetwork
member.summary: Link types of this topology are like those of topology, but they have directionality. You can specify a unique name that appears at each end of the link. The link looks different depending on which side you view it from.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Client.WorkItemLinkType.Topology.Dependency
member.summary: Link types of this topology are like those of topology, but they have an additional constraint to prevent circular relationships.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Client.WorkItemLinkType.Topology.Tree
member.summary: Link types of this topology have a tree shape. This topology enforces a one-to-many relationship and does not allow circularity.
